INSERT INTO T_LOGIN_LOG( LOG_SEQ , LOG_CLIENT_IP , LOG_ID , LOG_DIVN , LOG_IP_ERR_YN ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(TL.LOG_SEQ)+1,1) FROM T_LOGIN_LOG TL) ,#{logClientIp } ,#{loginSeq } ,'ma' ,'N' )
mapper.select:
/* LoginLog.selectList */
SELECT
LOG_CLIENT_IP logClientIp ,F_USER_NM(LOG_ID) logId ,DATE_FORMAT(LOG_DT, '%y.%m.%d') logDt ,COUNT(LOG_SEQ) logCnt ,MAX(DATE_FORMAT(LOG_DT, '%T')) maxLogDt
FROM t_login_log WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY logDt, logId, logClientIp HAVING logCnt >= 5

/* LoginLog.selectCount */
SELECT COUNT(LOG_SEQ) logCnt FROM T_LOGIN_LOG
